mapper.select: select ap.pro_image,ap.pro_id,p.image,p.store_name,p.price,p.ot_price from eb_activity_product ap inner join eb_store_product p on ap.pro_id = p.id where ap.aid = #{aid} and p.is_forced = 0 and p.is_show = 1 and p.is_recycle = 0 and p.is_del = 0 and p.audit_status = 1 order by ap.sort desc
